title: neranammitirA
sahitya:
nerenammitirA nIrajadaLa nayanA ninnu


anupallavi

  duritambulu tolaga jEyu doranIvani delisi cAla  


caraNam 1    sharaNAgata vatsala ninu satatamu golicina I bhUsuravarulanu karuNincina shubhadAyakuDani delisi
    caraNam 2    tIrarAni vyAdhulanu dIrceTi daivamu nIvani vAramu pUjincina vArini vini ninu madini
    caraNam 3    Asalu gala gOpAladAsuni rakSaNa jEsE I cuTa nIvani nAmadiyenci santasinci ninnu
